localised_text.tooltip_text: Campaign difficulty set by host. Difficulty cannot be changed when resuming a legendary multiplayer campaign.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: RecordList.Filter(IsPerPlayerSetting == false && Key != "campaign_difficulty" && Key != "character_loading" && Key != "realm_of_chaos" && Key != "enable_sea_lanes" && Key != "enable_end_game" && Key != "ironman_mode" && Key != "ai_minor_faction_potential" && Key != "ai_extra_aggro")

localised_text.tooltip_text: Click to zoom to province capital.
This settlement is controlled by another faction.

alliance.name: alliance
alliance.tooltip: Players inside a team will be locked into an unbreakable [[img:icon_military_alliance]][[/img]]military alliance and share victory conditions in order to win together as a team.

free_for_all.name: free_for_all
free_for_all.tooltip: Players in a free-for-all will be fighting for themselves, with their own set of victory conditions. Players will be able to form alliances between themselves as normal, but there can only be one campaign victor!

label_context_name.comment: Fill in context object and function to match objects dealing with so can display object. Also feel free to add any other children such as icons want to display for each entry, etc

label_num_available_factions.componentleveltooltip: Number of available factions available for this race

label_selected_race_when_single_race.comment: Shown when button to select race hidden when only single race playable, as still want to know which race playing as

label_tx.componentleveltooltip: Adjust the scale of all onscreen UI elements.||Scaling above 100% is permitted at 2560x1440 resolution and above.

list_box.comment: Fill in the context object and context function in order to populate the available list of options for the dropdown menu

not_compatible_icon.componentleveltooltip: [[col:red]]This Legendary Lord cannot be played with the Realm of Chaos victory conditions enabled.||To play as this Legendary Lord, turn off the Realm of Chaos victory conditions in the Game Settings.[[/col]]

popup_waiting.comment: Shown when joining a multiplayer battle before it is ready. Has animations that does opposite you would expect (show hides) in order to invert functionality

ready_parent.comment: Show the screen once we are actually ready and fully loaded in

selected_context_display.comment: Just fill in the context object and context function to display what information you want about the selected context from the dropdown. Feel free to also add any other children you want like icons, etc that you want to display related to the selected context!
